Name: Chained: A Victorian Nightmare
About the game: Chained: A Victorian Nightmare is a haunting VR adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic tale, A Christmas Carol that puts you at the center of the story. It's time to disbelieve your senses. Sit back and prepare to confront your past, present and future, in this bone-chilling journey of self-discovery. Heed the spirts warnings as your future is yet unwritten. - Seated Passive Experience - Immersive VR Theater
